===========
Raw Materials
===========

Setup a list of raw materials used for your batch recipes and packaged items. 

Click the add button |add| at the right of Raw Materials column in **Recipes** view.

.. |add| image:: add.png
  :width: 18
  :alt: Add Button

First three fields use the USDA database to help you setup your ingredients especially nutrition data and unit measurements. However this is optional and you may enter in all data below USDA fields.

All raw materials must have a default Vendor associated with it, multiple supplying vendors maybe added.

.. note::

	* Make sure to select if your ingredient is a liquid or solid
	* Recipe Measurements tab sets the UOM that will be used in Batch Recipes setup
